job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on large language models (LLMs) and other generative AI technologies. Specific responsibilities include creating autonomous support platforms using LLMs, integrating state-of-the-art AI like GPT-4 Vision, and enhancing AI solutions across infrastructures like AWS. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by generative AI.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs' directly relates to the core process of creating and adapting machine learning models, specifically generative ones like LLMs, for a specific task.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets' points to the software engineering aspects of building and maintaining applications, including user-facing components and their lifecycle management.
job_tasks.phrase: development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process' describes the development of a specific AI-powered application, which falls under the modeling category.
job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision' directly involves working with and implementing advanced AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows' indicates an understanding of how AI can be applied to business processes and helping others adopt it.
job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions' involves assessing and improving the core AI models and their functionality.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction' touches upon the operational aspects of ensuring AI solutions are functional and meet user needs in a production environment.
job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality' highlights the alignment of AI initiatives with broader business goals of innovation and service improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
